channel.title: Not Easy on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Not Easy on Simba Tango

item.title: Not so easy
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Simba tango A teacher and his former student, on his first trip to Buenos Aires, run into each other outside La Glorieta and starts to chat. Suddenly the student bursts out: **A:** (about the music) This is milonga, right? **S: **No, this is tango. The conversation is drawing to an end, as the teacher is heading home. They talk for another minute, until the next song of the tanda starts and the student is eager to dance more:
